body_html: Sorry, I'm looking at this a little bit out of context. Some of the places seem to require backticks, some should possibly have single quotes, but I think there are still a bunch where double quotes are proper. Why did all of them have to be changed?
body_text: Sorry, I'm looking at this a little bit out of context.  Some of the places seem to require backticks, some should possibly have single quotes, but I think there are still a bunch where double quotes are proper.  Why did all of them have to be changed?
body: Sorry, I'm looking at this a little bit out of context.  Some of the places seem to require backticks, some should possibly have single quotes, but I think there are still a bunch where double quotes are proper.  Why did *all* of them have to be changed?
